description: The Innergie PocketCell is a universal rechargeable mobile battery bank designed to provide you power when you need it the most for USB-powered devices. It charges USB-powered mobile devices, including tablets, smartphones, mp3 players, portable game consoles and more. Has 5 built-in protections to protect your gear.
title: Innergie PocketCell - 3,000 mAh 2.1A USB Portable Battery Pack and Charger with USB Magic Cable Trio
